thread.title: Keith Wilkinson
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Keith Wilkinson

author: Keith Wilkinson
title: Keith Wilkinson
text: I have recently purchased two Barbour jackets on two seperate occasions. Ordering was easy. On both occasions delivery was very quick. The second order was placed at 3.50 pm and it arrived at 9.30 the enxt morning, fantastic. I have not had to use it but the returns policy and procedure looks very good. I shall use this company again and recommend it strongly.
